mapper.sql: ID, REPAY_APPLY_ID, APPLY_INFO_ID, REPAY_NO, LOAN_APPLY_ID, POLICY_ID, POLICY_CODE, REPAY_TYPE, APPLY_CUSTOMER_ID, APPLY_AMOUNT, REPAY_VALUE, REPAY_RATE, HANDFEE, ACTUAL_REPAY_AMOUNT, REPAY_TIME, INSURANCE_COMPANY, LOAN_COMPANY, STATUS, ISVALID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE
mapper.update: update T_REPAY_APPLY SET ISVALID='0' where REPAY_APPLY_ID = #{repayApplyId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into T_REPAY_APPLY (REPAY_APPLY_ID, APPLY_INFO_ID, REPAY_NO, LOAN_APPLY_ID, POLICY_ID, POLICY_CODE, REPAY_TYPE, APPLY_CUSTOMER_ID, APPLY_AMOUNT, REPAY_VALUE, REPAY_RATE, HANDFEE, ACTUAL_REPAY_AMOUNT, REPAY_TIME, INSURANCE_COMPANY, LOAN_COMPANY, STATUS, ISVALID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE ) values (#{repayApplyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{applyInfoId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{repayNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loanApplyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{policyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{policyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repayType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyCustomerId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{applyAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{repayValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{repayRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{handfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{actualRepayAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{repayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{insuranceCompany,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{loanCompany,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '1', #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update T_REPAY_APPLY set ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, APPLY_INFO_ID = #{applyInfoId,jdbcType=CHAR}, REPAY_NO = #{repayNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOAN_APPLY_ID = #{loanApplyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, POLICY_ID = #{policyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, POLICY_CODE = #{policyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPAY_TYPE = #{repayType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_CUSTOMER_ID = #{applyCustomerId,jdbcType=CHAR}, APPLY_AMOUNT = #{applyAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REPAY_VALUE = #{repayValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REPAY_RATE = #{repayRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HANDFEE = #{handfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACTUAL_REPAY_AMOUNT = #{actualRepayAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REPAY_TIME = #{repayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INSURANCE_COMPANY = #{insuranceCompany,jdbcType=CHAR}, LOAN_COMPANY = #{loanCompany,jdbcType=CHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where REPAY_APPLY_ID = #{repayApplyId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select from T_REPAY_APPLY where REPAY_APPLY_ID = #{repayApplyId,jdbcType=CHAR} AND ISVALID = '1'
